questions.A: Recent college graduates, students taking gap year, dropouts, professionals looking to switch careers, anyone learning web development but needs right environment and guidance. No prior programming knowledge required.

questions.Q: Does AltCampus help me get a job?
questions.A: Yes. All we can. We help you at every stage, help you build strong portfolio, prepare for interviews, put you in touch with companies for interview.

questions.Q: How does the entire process work?
questions.A: You can read about it here - How it works.

questions.Q: Is this course self-paced or batched?
questions.A: This program follows a blended approach. Students can move at their own pace, however they will be matched with peers learning same concepts.
